form.name: breast_engorgment
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Mother: PNC Diagnostic Mother Breast Problems> Breast Engorgment

field.name: Counsel mother on what to do for breast engorgement
Counsel mother on good breastfeeding practices
Record care given in client’s maternal health or “Red” book.
Follow up with client in a few days to see if there is improvement. If not, refer mother to see a midwife at the health center
